text: Inulin is used as a prebiotic to improve the quality of skim milk fermented by pure cultures of Lactobacillus acidophilus, Lactobacillus rhamnosus, Lactobacillus bulgaricus and Bifidobacterium lactis, Streptococcus thermophilus, or a cocktail containing all them.
